results.description:
Foursight™ is the best new game since Words with Friends!

Foursight is Easy to Learn, Quick to Master!  This is the Next Generation of Chess and Checkers!  The Ultimate Strategy Board Game!  You control half of your opponents scoring pieces while playing to be the first to 4 points!

Every game is unique!  Can you become a Foursight Champion?

Universal App works on the iPad, iPhone, and iPod Touch!

iPad Users, use 1 iPad to play a friend in Two Player Mode!  Can you beat all your friends?

Multiplayer Version for Internet and Bluetooth play COMING SOON! 

Foursight™ is a cool new strategy board game. To win, you must learn to think like your opponent; requiring that you play half your opponents’ pieces in addition to those of your own. 

The object is to score 4 in-a-row Across, Down or Diagonally. You can also win by getting 3 in-a-row 4 times over. 

Foursight™ is for all who enjoy classic strategy board games, like chess, Connect Four, tic-tac-toe, backgammon and Othello™. 

“…it will easily grab you and satisfy you for a long time to come”

“...don’t expect to master this game unless you can handle strategically rich tabletop classics like chess”

**GAMEPRO iOS Game of the Day scoring a 4 STAR rating!**

“A connect-four type board game with strategic depth” 

”…a truly remarkable game…”

**Common Sense Media 4 STARS**
 
"If you enjoy a quick, simple, but smart strategy board game, then have the foresight to get it now."

"8/10"

"In the realm of strategic board games, it’s easy to spot a simple but challenging game. Foursight is both entertaining and intelligent."

Appcraver
results.releaseNotes:
- Universal App for iPad, iPhone, and iPod Touch
- Two Player iPad Game Mode
- Updated Graphics
